title: Heidi Klum Reveals Halloween Costume Sneak Peek On Instagram
text:
If your favourite part of October isn’t Heidi Klum’s annual Halloween costume, I don’t know what’s wrong with you.

The 46-year-old supermodel is renowned for being the literal queen of Halloween, so her annual costume reveal is almost a bigger deal than the holiday itself.

So obviously, I lost my fucking mind when she dropped this teaser on Instagram.

Heidi’s annual Halloween party has hosted guests like J. Lo and Chrissy Teigen since the year 2000, and although the rest of the guests attempt to steal Heidi’s thunder, she always wins best dressed.

Previous years have seen the supermodel dress up as Princess Fiona from Shrek, a scarily convincing old lady, and even a sultry IRL version of Jessica Rabbit. But that time in 2011 when she dressed up as that creepy human body figure in your high school science classroom definitely takes the cake.

So what the fuck is she wearing this year?

This isn’t the first teaser we’ve seen from her either, with the former Project Runway host sharing another Halloween prep video back on August 22nd, proving that whatever this costume is, it has taken some serious prep work.

All we know so far is that the costume has taken months to prep and will take a whopping 10 hours to prepare. The videos she’s posted haven’t really given anything away, but fans are already tweeting their excitement for her annual costume reveal. All hail Heidi Klum, the queen of the ‘ween.

Can’t stop thinking about what Heidi Klum is gonna be for Halloween this year — mol (@mollyerin_) October 17, 2019

Petition to rename Halloween “National Heidi Klum Day” — julien (*ˉ︶ˉ*) (@JulienRouleau1) October 16, 2019

Anyone else thinking about who or what @heidiklum will be for Halloween this year? ???????? — leonipepperoni♎️ (@leonihunt) October 16, 2019
description: Supermodel and reality TV personality Heidi Klum has revealed a sneak peek of her highly anticipated Halloween costume on Instagram.
